name: Triangle Tussle
description:
Triangle Tussle is a game made as part of the Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2019.

Objective : Last Triangle Standing.
Controls : Your Triangle Moves in the Direction of the Mouse Cursor.
Additional Info : When 2 triangles collide the bigger triangle gets bigger and changes colour based on the colour of the smaller triangle. The smaller triangle is destroyed. Border is lethal and shrinks.

Theme - DNA Chaos

Achivements :

  • Maverick - Your team size is 1.
  • Iron Triangle - Your game primarily uses triangles for its art.
  • INNOVATION! - Your game is a battle royale
  • One Punch Man - Your game is controllable with a single input.

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Edm Detection Mode" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
